description:
liberty release, when the instance don't have any network info ,seems master has same issue

| OS-DCF:diskConfig                    | MANUAL                                                   |
| OS-EXT-AZ:availability_zone          | 1234                                                     |

comments.content: How did you get into this state? Can you recreate? Looks like you're starting a VM, but I'm not sure how the nw info got wiped out from the instance.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Automatically discovered version liberty in description. If this is incorrect, please update the description to include 'nova version: ...'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
